CustomField.description: Defines if the Total Tax column will be displayed in the Invoice PDF documents. This applies only to the table within the main invoice body. The invoice totals will still be shown in the header and footer of the invoice
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines if the Total Tax column will be displayed in the Invoice PDF documents. This applies only to the table within the main invoice body. The invoice totals will still be shown in the header and footer of the invoice
CustomField.label: Enable Total Tax on Invoice
